definition: to retire from the military, sport etc/to demobilize/to decommission/retired from use
to retreat/to decline/to move back/to withdraw
forced labor/corvée/obligatory task/military service/to use as servant/to enserf/servant (old)/war/campaign/battle

sentences.english: Thirdly, to obtain employment successfully, ex-servicemen should bring into play their predominance themselves too.
sentences.chinese: 再者，退役军人在就业时也应当注意发挥自身优势。

sentences.english: If the cutover is successful, the old node is decommissioned.
sentences.chinese: 如果切换成功，旧的节点将退役。

sentences.english: When (Juventus keeper Gigi) Buffon retires, the best goalkeeper will be Igor Akinfeev.
sentences.chinese: 当布冯退役后，当今第一门将将会是阿金费耶夫。

sentences.english: He was invalided out of the army.
sentences.chinese: 他因伤病而被迫退役了。

sentences.english: Many others will be filled by “retired” army officers.
sentences.chinese: 另有许多席位留给了“退役的”军职人员。

sentences.english: This is an organization in charge of the affairs of the disabled ex-service men.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个负责退役残疾军人事务的组织。

sentences.english: I retired from the military in 1979 as a lieutenant colonel.
sentences.chinese: 我1979年从部队退役，那时候我是一位上校。

sentences.english: Leb?uf and Zola retired in one month.
sentences.chinese: 勒伯夫和佐拉在同一月内相继退役。

sentences.english: Wedge eventually retired from active duty when peace between the New Republic and the Imperial Remnant was achieved.
sentences.chinese: 新共和国和帝国残余实现和平后，韦奇终于退役了。

sentences.english: The wisdom of the retired generals and backbench MPs conjoins.
sentences.chinese: 退役将军和后座议员的智慧结合在一起。

sentences.english: Since 1954, forty names have been retired.
sentences.chinese: 从1954年一来，光荣退役的名字有40个。

sentences.english: Thirdly, the demos' psychology is not symmetrical with ex-servicemen's conceptions of choosing occupation.
sentences.chinese: 其三，民众心理状态与退役军人择业观念的不对称。

sentences.english: Sotirios Kyrgiakos has announced his retirement from international football with Greece.
sentences.chinese: 吉尔吉亚科斯决定正式从希腊国家队中退役。

sentences.english: He is open to the idea of returning to Gremio and play here until he retires.
sentences.chinese: 他正有回归格雷米奥的打算，在这里提到退役。

sentences.english: Michael Jorden surnamed “Flying Trapezist” has stepped out of the NBA.
sentences.chinese: “空中飞人”迈克尔乔丹已从NBA中退役了。

sentences.english: "I just think if he was going to retire, he'd tell me first, " Heisley said.
sentences.chinese: 我觉得他不会退役的，他至少会先告诉我的。

definition: Kobe Bryant/abbr. for 科比·布萊恩特|科比·布莱恩特[Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4]
(old) combat robe/soldier's uniform/(sports) team jersey/team shirt
Staples (Center), sports arena in Los Angeles
to take a curtain call/(fig.) to come to an end
Kobe Bryant (1978-2020), Los Angeles Lakers NBA star
pinyin: Ke1 bi3 · Bu4 lai2 en1 te4

definition: Los Angeles Lakers/abbr. for 洛杉磯湖人|洛杉矶湖人[Luo4 shan1 ji1 Hu2 ren2]
Wade (name)/Sir Thomas Francis Wade (1818-1895), sinologist 威妥瑪|威妥玛[Wei1 Tuo3 ma3]
to serve in the army/in active service
